meaningMnemonic: You know that a 郵便 is the <kanji>mail</kanji> and that a 番号 is a <kanji>number</kanji>. So a "mail number," what is that? Usually refers to your <vocabulary>post number</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>postal code</vocabulary>. It is also often referred to with a symbol, which is 〒, so look out for that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
